title: Dennis Quaid, 65, confirms engagement to girlfriend Laura Savoie, 26, on Hawaiian getaway
text:

Dennis Quaid, 65, has proposed to his 26-year-old girlfriend.

The Parent Trap actor confirmed the news on Monday after he got down on one knee and popped the question to his younger lover last week.

He confessed he had been planning the special moment for a month-and-a-half, and waited until sunset in Oahu, Hawaii, to ask Laura to marry him.

It comes after Dennis first went public with his PhD student girlfriend five months ago.

He told Extra: "It happened on the very northernmost point of Oahu, at Turtle Bay. It was kind of spontaneous. It was very much a surprise."

"I had the ring in my pocket… It has been kind of a month-and-a-half plan… I wanted it to be private," the star confessed.

(Image: Getty)

The proposal really was rather spontaneous as the actor chose to ask her at the exact moment Laura went to take a selfie of them together.

He continued: "She was actually taking a selfie of us, and I put the ring in front and said, "Will you marry me?" — and then she fell down."

On Sunday the pair made their first red carpet appearance together at the Midway screening in Hawaii - the new film that Dennis is set to debut in.

(Image: Getty Images for Lionsgate Enter)

His girlfriend donned a floral turquoise dress and accessorised with her chunky diamond engagement ring.

And they were pictured about to go paddle boarding together on Friday on their mini romantic break.

Their romance blossomed after he finalised his third divorce in August 2018.

(Image: Reuters)

Before Laura came along, Dennis dated 32-year-old model Santa Auzina after he split from wife Kimberly Quaid, 46.

The pair were first married in 2004 but called off their relationship in 2016, and Kimberly was the one to file for divorce.
description: The Parent Trap star has confirmed he will be marrying his much younger girlfriend
